description.value: The explorer can spend a Fate Point to Automatically suceed on any Tech-Use Test with a number of Degrees of Success equal to their Intelligence Bonus.

system.benefit: The explorer can spend a Fate Point to Automatically suceed on any Tech-Use Test with a number of Degrees of Success equal to their Intelligence Bonus.

prerequisites.text: Tau, Scholastic Lore (Tau Empire), Common Lore (War)
